SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.controllers

Class CycleController

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.controllers.CycleController
@Path("/cycles") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public class CycleController extends Object
REST Controller for managing cycle-related operations.

Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on cycles, including creation, retrieval, updating, and filtering functionality.

    • getCycleById

      @GET @Path("/{id}") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getCycleById(@PathParam("id") Long id)

      Parameters:
      id - The cycle ID
      Returns:

    • getCyclesWithFilters

      @GET public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getCyclesWithFilters(@QueryParam("state") CycleState state, @QueryParam("adminId") Long adminId, @QueryParam("startDateFrom") String startDateFrom, @QueryParam("startDateTo") String startDateTo, @QueryParam("limit") @DefaultValue("50") Integer limit, @QueryParam("offset") @DefaultValue("0") Integer offset)
      Retrieves all cycles or cycles with filtering options.
      Parameters:
      state - Optional filter by cycle state
      adminId - Optional filter by administrator ID
      startDateFrom - Optional filter for cycles starting after this date (ISO format)
      startDateTo - Optional filter for cycles starting before this date (ISO format)
      limit - Maximum number of results
      offset - Starting position for pagination
      Returns:
      Response with list of filtered cycle DTOs

      @GET @Path("/current") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getCurrentActiveCycle()
      Retrieves the current active cycle.
      Returns:
      Response with the current active cycle DTO or 404 if none exists

      Returns:

    • closeExpiredCycles

      @POST @Path("/close-expired") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response closeExpiredCycles()
      Automatically closes expired cycles. This endpoint can be called by a scheduled job or admin to automatically close cycles that have passed their end date.
      Returns:
      Response with the number of cycles that were closed

      Parameters:
      id - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      Response with validation result and details
